VAR at risk of changing the spirit of football, says Pochettino – video
03 Nov 2019, 21:10 by SNTV



Spurs manager, Mauricio Pochettino, raised his concerns about the use of VAR after his side’s 1–1 draw with Everton, which was overshadowed by a horrific leg injury suffered by André Gomes. Pochettino argued that the referee should have used the technology at his disposal to check whether the tackle made by Son Heung-min on Gomes deserved a red card


Everton’s Cenk Tosun saves the day against Spurs after Gomes leg-break
